鱑字的基本解释

鱑
huáng
古同“鳇”。

鱑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huáng］
［《集韻》胡光切，平唐，匣。］
“鳇1”的繁体字。亦作“鱑1”。
鳣。又名鲟鳇鱼。鱼纲鲟科。形体与鲟相似，唯左右鳃膜相连。大的体长可达五米，有五行硬甲，口大，半月形，两旁有扁平的须。

鱑字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鱑； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1478第10
【廣韻】【集韻】?胡光切，音黃。魚名。或作鰉。

鱑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
鱑字的起名意思

暂无。

鱑
Basic explanation of words
鱑
huáng
The ancient same "stor".
鱑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huáng］
["Ji Yun" Hu Guangqie, Ping Tang, Xia. ]
"鳇1" in traditional characters. Also known as "鱑1".
Bonito. Also known as sturgeon. Fish class sturgeon family. The body is similar to the sturgeon, except that the left and right gill membranes are connected. The large body can reach up to five meters in length, has a five-element hard armor, a large mouth, a half moon shape, and flat whiskers on both sides.
鱑
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鱑; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1478 Page 10
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Hu Guangqie, yellow tone. The name of the fish. Or as a snakehead.
